data.text: @Dougbhou Hello, Bear in mind that this situation, which is being presented to you, must be handled under a request so that our area in charge can solve it. In case you already have one created, tell us via DM the number of your case. We are looking forward to your response. Regards.
@ellyp77 We appreciate your comments. We'll make sure to pass them to the indicated area. Thank you. Regards
@amsterdamred Hello, we just left DM. Regards.
@markjellwood Hi, in order to assist you please provide us with more details by private message. We will be waiting for your reply.
@ronniepeter Hi, in order to assist you please provide us with more details by private message. We will be waiting for your reply.
@rafaliou Hello, we apologize for the experience. You can raise a complaint on the following link: https://t.co/Wk3KWvFcNv. Kind regards.
@jburns178 Hello, please provide us by DM with your Latam reservation code, ticket number, along with the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@poderosacoding Hello, please provide us by DM with your Latam's booking code and ticket number, along with the full name of the passenger. We will stay tuned.
@poderosacoding Hello, we just left DM. Regards.
@MitchellPastene Hello, we just left DM. Regards.
@guriboy007 If you need assistance, please let us know via DM. We look forward to your response. Regards
@heyimalinel Hi, you can get in touch with our Baggage department at the following link: https://t.co/SJMeknzn55   Regards.
The world is full of women who, despite prejudices, fly over frontiers to shorten distances and achieve their dreams 🙋🏻‍♀️✨ #WeTouchTheClouds https://t.co/7OwMtfeRri
@mrjpy Hola, tu caso se encuentra en gestión y hemos ingresado todos tus comentarios para agilizar el proceso de respuesta. Aguarda nuestro contacto. Saludos.
@guriboy007 Hi, the ticket number can be found on the email confirmation received at the moment of the purchase. Regards.
@flightlevelfoto Corey, you also have the option of booking through our contact center in the United States at (866) 435-9526. Regards.

@flightlevelfoto Hi, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We would suggest for you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer. If it doesn't work, you can try using a different device.  Regards.
@PFrequente 😎 ✈️
@dalilchipmunk Hi, please send us via Inbox your claim number to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@kazuuuuuuuus Hi, through this means we can also assist you. Please let us know the details of your inquiry. If it is regarding a reservation or case, write us by DM to protect your personal information. We look forward to your response.

data.text: @msff__________ Hello, we have sent you a message via inbox. Kind regards.
@natureboi1990 Hi, we have sent you private message. Regards.

@los_canguros Hola, con el fin de asistirte, envíanos por favor por medio de un mensaje privado el número de ticket (13 números) o el código de reserva (6 letras), y el nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@msff__________ Hello, bear in mind that all flights are subject to availability. Kind regards.
@Rmercader Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference for LATAM and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@pecanhavafatty Hi, in order to carry the respective validations, please send us via DM more details of the purchase attempt or the reservation code (if you have it) and the passenger's full name. We look forward to your response. Regards
@valerioluccio Hi, Please provided us via DM your claim or case number to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.
@CynDelaguila Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@BrianRi42132686 Hi, we have responded to your private messages. Regards.
@jdsjr71 Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@marynybound9603 Hi, we suggest you to delete your comments since it has personal information and write us through DM. Rest assure we keep working on your request to assist you as soon as possible. Regards.
@Lorenamm2592 Please provide us via DM the case number associated to your claim. We will stay tuned.
@jonasjo43809329 Hi, if the ticket was purchased through a third party (travel agency), any management must be directly with them and be subject to their politics, not LATAM's. Regards
@scl24408406 Hola Luna, puedes ingresar a este link https://t.co/tC77eWngvr colocando la información solicitada y verás todos los requisitos de entrada. Saludos.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Perú.

data.text: @NickiDee_ Hi, the entry requirements that we can provide as an airline are in the following link https://t.co/2ISkctKdAe, however, we recommend you to verify the information with the embassy or local authorities. Best regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @Lorenamm2592 Hello Lorena, please get in contact with our baggage department through WhatsApp here: https://t.co/bJXq28Tzhg, or through our contact center: https://t.co/HUr4zwCxqv, and request for your call to be transferred to them, so they can assist you with your claim. Best regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @jmaldo1024 Hi, please provide us via DM with your case number and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@dougbutner We will stay tuned future inquiries. Best regards.

@soderbergmills Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@SEO_TARGET2022 Hi, in order to forward the information to the area in charge, please provide us with your contact information. Regards.
@marynybound9603 Hello, we have left your comments on the case. We will be communicating with you as soon as we have a response. Regards.
@myriam_olivares Hi, in order for us to carry out the necessary validations, please send us the details of your account via DM. We look forward to your response. Regards
@dougbutner Hi, in order to carry out the respective validations, please send us via DM more details of the issue you had with the ticket. We look forward to your response. Regards
@marynybound9603 Hello, we checked your case and the medical exception was not approved. We replied you to rise a complaint, you can do it on this link https://t.co/vj9mrnrMrv. Regards.

@AWBOPT Hello, we apologize for the bad experience. In order to assist you with your request, please provide us with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@Sedin_love Hello, please provide us via DM with your protocol number or the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@DaniGuzzo Hola Daniela, para ayudarte de la mejor forma posible, indícanos al DM cual es el código de tu reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 números) y nombre completo de quien viaja. E indicanos más detalle de tu requerimiento, Estaremos pendientes de tu respuesta. Saludos

@cjhart34 Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@alfa_773 Hola, te hemos enviado un mensaje al DM. Saludos.
@alfa_773 Hola, envianos mayor detalle de tu caso a través del DM. Quedamos atentos.
@RachanokC Hi, please send us via DM your refund request number, or your ticket number  and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.
@BobSaltzstein Hi, the basic fare does not include checked baggage, you can purchase extra luggage through our website https://t.co/wYZCNyppgh. Best regards.
@Giulianita_hdc Te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM.
@traveli92070952 Hi, please send us via DM your refund request number to check this with you further. Regards.

@Lady_Sabinna Hi, we sorry for the inconveniences this situation may have caused you, we encourage you to submit your concerns in the following link: https://t.co/m0DaApLm5r, and we will provide you with a formal response. Best regards.

@puctabi Hi, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience with our Customer Care Team in the following link https://t.co/PHGQWjQhOz, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Best regards.
@davidmCPA Hello, please send us into our DM your case number in order to check this further. Best regards.

@jonasjo43809329 Jonas, as the ticket was purchased and is in the control of an agency, all the management must be directed at them.If they have any issues, they must contact LATAM's travel agency support desk.This is a procedure that can only be performed by the agency, not the customer. Regards

@AntonioMamais Rest assured that your case is already escalated and being dealt with by our department in charge. We've registered your comments, and as soon as we have a follow-up or outcome, you will be immediately notified. Regards.

@AntonioMamais Hello, we have verified that your case is being worked on by the area in charge. It is due to the large amount of requests that the resolution time has been extended. As soon as they have an answer for you, they will let you know through email. Best regards.
@san_peru Hemos validado la información del caso, sin embargo no tenemos reportes de lo que nos mencionas. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @CynthiaRiva9 Hello, we have sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@mayination Mariana, Mariana We kindly recommend submitting a complaint at the following link: https://t.co/OmcOkc2sPy  Regards.

@mayination You should know that we don't have that information, if you want to book a flight or assistance you can communicate with our Contact center line, in the following link you can find the different numbers depending on of the country you are in https://t.co/rKH3nv2knz. Regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @san_peru Hola, por favor envíanos los detalles de tu consulta. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@lucasnieto We encourage you to submit the concerns about your experience by entering the following link: https://t.co/I05tdRRscj, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Regards.

@HCrevelari Hi, in order to assist you please send us by private message the travel voucher number, full name of the applicant, email address, amount of the travel voucher, type, number and country of issue of the identity document. We will be waiting for your reply.
@kcarolino_ We've sent you a DM. Regards.

@lucasnieto You need to be more specific, let us know if the error is for the purchase of a new ticket or the attempted purchase of luggage. If the error is for the purchase of a ticket we can assist you with that purchase, as well as with the bags.
@lucasnieto Lucas, please let us know if the error you have is due to a ticket or baggage purchase.

@CynthiaRiva9 Hi Cynthia, We’ve checked the case and noticed that the area in charge is still working on it. We’ve sent them your comments and an internal note in order to get an answer as soon as possible. Regards.
@marcelospellman Hola, para una asistencia adecuada, por favor indícanos por DM el código de reserva (6 letras) o el número de ticket (13 dígitos) y el nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@PaolaBerlin Hola, por favor envíanos por DM el código de tu reserva o número de orden. Quedamos atentos.
@andysassi Hola, te respondimos por DM. Saludos.

@schmitty0436 Hi, we would you to communicate directly with our baggage department through WhatsApp here: https://t.co/TVaalepjhw, or through our contact center: https://t.co/wal84XEaWU, and request for your call to be transferred to them, so they can assist you with your claim. Best regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @isc991 Hello, tell us via DM how we can assist you. We stay tuned.
@Lindapatcar Hola, te ofrecemos disculpas, si deseas poner un reclamos lo puedes hacer por medio de este enlace https://t.co/kF8No64uca. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS

data.text: @aria_jamshidi Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@HaitianNomad Hi, we have responded to your request via DM. Regards.
@CynthiaRiva9 Hello Cynthia, let us know in our DM your case number in order to check this further. Best regards.
@notsu9 Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@PaulFenner12 Hola, te informamos que los pasajeros que obtuvieron un Pase de Movilidad autorizado deben realizar una prueba de PCR o de antígenos a su llegada a Chile para acortar su período de cuarentena. Para mayor información: https://t.co/JcUym5tOfO. Saludos.

data.text: @betanasser Hello Roberta, please provide us via DM with the case number and protocol numbers. We stay tuned.

@PaulFenner12 Hola, envíanos el código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos); a su vez, el nombre completo de los pasajeros, en caso viajes con otras personas, a través de un DM. Aguardamos tu respuesta. Saludos.
@NinjaCeci Hi, we suggest you to delete your public post, as it contains personal information, and contact us via DM to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.

@jonasjo43809329 Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@ValentineCirce Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@iameliasw You are very welcome. Kind regards.

We continue digitalizing the world's airports. The Express bag drop arrived at Miami International Airport 😱! From now on, you can dispatch your baggage yourself with fewer lines and quickly, safely and autonomously 😄. Learn more at https://t.co/tHlp20GwO1 ✈️. https://t.co/msfrzgqcl0

@johnnorq Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@iameliasw Hi, sometimes the functioning of our website may be affected, so we suggest you delete cookies and browsing history, change your browser or purchase from another device. Nevertheless, if the problem continues, please contact us via DM to check this with you further. Regards.

Let’s go on a tour without frontiers through San Pedro de Atacama, Pipa, Cusco, Cartagena, and Galápagos with our safety video✈️! Get to know the onboard safety instructions while visiting the best of South America. #LATAMSafetyVideo 🎬 Watch it at https://t.co/giavWrsKHA https://t.co/YjP6ACxqXn
@leolp_7 Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards

@CrankyNicon INTERNATIONAL CONNECTIONS in Brazil: they are allowed. Passengers connecting through Brazil are exempt from presenting a certificate of an RT-PCR test or Antigen test and "Declaração de Saúde do Viajante", as long as you remain in the departure lounge. https://t.co/6SirtUZXy1 https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
